why.title: Why - our purpose
why.description: We believe that everyone deserves to live with dignity and independence in their own homes. Our mission is to give elderly people security and their families peace of mind in everyday life, while providing caregivers with reliable tools to deliver the best possible care.

how.title: How - our approach
how.description: Our technology is discreet, reliable and trustworthy. We use sensors, a gateway and a cloud solution that monitors patterns and sends alerts only when action is needed. This ensures safety without unnecessary disruptions.

what.title: What - our solutions
solutions: Bed sensors that detect presence, movement and activity patterns
Gateway that sends data securely without extra user effort
Cloud solution that analyzes signals in real time
Alerts and dashboards for families, municipalities and healthcare personnel

benefits.title: Benefits
items: For families: peace of mind in everyday life
For caregivers: clear and actionable alerts, not noise
For municipalities: a scalable solution that reduces costs for institutional care

hero.title: Take care of your loved ones - safely, simply, and at home
hero.description: For you as a relative who needs follow-up of your loved ones at home. Our unique sensors automatically detect irregularities related to safety and security, so you can get alerts when needed.

alarm.title: That they won't be able to say something?
alarm.description: Solutions for alarm and communication include alerts for sudden illness, two-way communication with video, and geofence functions that give you peace of mind when your loved ones are home or out.

medical.title: For acute illness?
medical.description: Monitoring for heart problems, diabetes and regular measurements of breathing, blood pressure, sleep, blood sugar, body temperature and oxygen saturation. Automatic alerts for deviations.

safety.title: For falls at home?
safety.description: Worried about falls in the bathroom, on the stairs or in the bedroom? Our discrete fall sensors automatically detect falls and send immediate alerts to you or healthcare personnel.

guidance.title: Not sure what you need?
guidance.description: Tell us about everyday life at home with your loved ones, and you'll get a non-binding proposal for solutions that are perfect for you.

whyChoose.title: Why choose us?
whyChoose.easySetup: You don't need to be technical. If you've managed to hang up a picture, you can set this up.
whyChoose.security: Our solutions are made for Norwegian homes and follow strict requirements for privacy and data security.
whyChoose.modular: You can start simple and expand later if needs change.
whyChoose.noHiddenCosts: Everything is without commitment and hidden startup costs.
